The Password is not stored on the device and is requested again for each connection to the bank. Load accounts No bank added yet. Import maximum available transaction history

Update transactions End-to-end reference Customer Reference Mandate reference Creditor identifier Debtor identifier Balance Load Import into Select the bank accounts that you want to manage with My Expenses. You can either import them into a new account or select any existing account (with exception of cash accounts) as target. In the latter case, you will need to adjust the account\'s opening balance manually. Please be aware, that not all banks provide access to all accounts by the procedure that My Expenses understands (For example, for Sparkassen, credit cards are not supported). From the main screen, when an account linked to your bank is displayed, select Load transactions from the menu in order to update.
